price: 2. Welnee, zij zijn verbaasd dat er een waarschuwer tot hen is gekomen van hun eigen volk. Dus de ongelovigen zeggen: “Dit is iets vreemds!
arabic: بَلۡ عَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٌ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: bal ʿajibū an jāahum mundhirun min'hum faqāla al-kāfirūna hādhā shayon ʿajībun
